channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-5915] Python postcommit test_read_metrics times out
item.description:
Happened a couple of times:

https://scans.gradle.com/s/u7z2b7mwyghwi/console-log?task=:beam-sdks-python:validatesRunnerBatchTests#L142

https://scans.gradle.com/s/b3zz6oyq3ueuw/console-log?task=:beam-sdks-python:validatesRunnerBatchTests

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
